title: Dancing Zombie

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
> Roleblock someone.

> Once per game, summon 4 Backup Dancers.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> Backup Dancers are NPCs named Backup Dancers. They have the Zombie goal, and are controlled by Dancing Zombie. The Backup Dancers **can** vote.

> Backup Dancers must always do the factional kill. The first time the Backup Dancers successfully kill someone, they all die to a lawnmower.

> Roleblock Immunity.

> Backup Dancers have roleblock immunity.

desc:
Post 2606
*Dancing Zombie's latest album, "GrarrBRAINSarblarbl," is already rocketing up the undead charts.*
